author: trackreco
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the ability to run mkFit on Phase2 data / geometry. Only initialStep iteration is supported.

* missing part from trackreco/cmssw#144 -- add CMSSW Phase2 Hit and Seed Converters

* Properly support binary readout for Phase2 strips where cluster-charge cut can
not be applied.

* Improve standalone performance monitoring & debugging tools.

Requires also a new JSON file in `cmssw/data` repository.

#### PR validation:

Copy over description from trackreco/cmssw#144.

Potentially also run Phase1 validation ... though no changes are expected.
title: [mkFit] Mid-way support for Phase2 initialStep in CMSSW
